short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An easy way for you to check the price of your favorite coins and tokens

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CryptoStats is a chrome extension that allows you to stay up to date with your favorite crypto prices without leaving your browser tab
